content: materials - 6 skeins of purl soho s line weight 1 100% merino wool each skein is 494 yards/ 100 grams approximately 1240 yards total required - a size c 2 75 mm crochet hook 2 gauge 8 double_crochet clusters = 4 inches size approximately 10 inches wide by 65 inches long 1 https //www purlsoho com/line-weight html 2 https //www purlsoho com/tools/crochet-hooks html
